text: Matthias Cuntz (born 4 May 1990 in Karlsruhe) is a German footballer who plays for SV Elversberg. Cuntz made his debut for Karlsruhe on 5 February 2010, in a 2–1 away defeat against St. Pauli, coming off the bench to replace Marco Engelhardt in the 61st minute. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Karlsruhe Category:German footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Karlsruher SC players Category:Karlsruher SC II players Category:SC Rheindorf Altach players Category:SV Eintracht Trier 05 players Category:SV Elversberg players Category:2. title: Matthias Cuntz
